cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Basic 6 bed dorm. 3 bunks set in their own cubicles for extra privacy. Shared facilities, all linen provided, ceiling fans and plenty of lockers. NO AIR/CON OPTION. Mixed Sex. Under 35 year age limit. International passport required.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
4 bed deluxe mixed sex dorm (No Bunks!) with shared bathroom facilities, TV, ceiling fan and air/con.
Under 35 years age limit. International passport required.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private double room, pedestal or ceiling fan, shared bathroom facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Motel style private double room with private bathroom facilities, TV, towels, ceiling fan, mini fridge, extra pillows and Air/con. Motel quality without the motel price tag!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Superior 6 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Fully equipped studio. Double bed plus 2 bunks, private bathroom facilities, fully equipped kitchen, smart TV, air/con, fridge/freezer, microwave. Home away from home!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
